third postoperative day.context: The patient is now on his third postoperative day for an open reduction and internal fixation for two facial fractures, as well as open reduction nasal fracture.

eighth hospital day.context: The patient is now on his third postoperative day for an open reduction and internal fixation for two facial fractures, as well as open reduction nasal fracture. He is on his eighth hospital day.

nasal packing.context: The patient had nasal packing in place, which was removed this evening.

swelling.context: Examination of the face revealed some decreased swelling today.

occlusion.context: He had good occlusion with intact intermaxillary fixation.

tracheotomy tube.context: His tracheotomy tube is in place.

size 8 Shiley nonfenestrated.context: It is a size 8 Shiley nonfenestrated.

Halcion 5 mg.context: The patient is in need of something for sleep in the evening, so we have recommended Halcion 5 mg at bedtime and repeat of 5 mg in 1 hour if needed.

noncuffed or a fenestrated tube.context: Tomorrow, we will go ahead and change his trach to a noncuffed or a fenestrated tube, so he may communicate and again this will facilitate his swallowing.

decannulation.context: Hopefully, we can decannulate the tracheotomy tube in the next few days.

prison infirmary.context: Overall, I believe this patient is doing well, and we will look forward to being able to transfer him to the prison infirmary.
